painPoints.card4Description: When key people leave, processes break. Knowledge lives in heads, not systems. Every departure is a mini-crisis.

painPoints.card6Description: Tasks that could be fully automated are still done manually. Copy-paste, data entry, report generation — all by hand, every day.

faq.title: Common Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working with A7X Systems.
faq.q1: What makes A7X different from other AI consultants?
faq.a1: We prioritize Process Clarity before implementation. While most consultants jump straight to tools, we first map your entire operation, identify the highest-ROI opportunities, and create a clear automation roadmap. This approach ensures every automation delivers measurable results — not just technical novelty.
faq.q2: How long does a typical engagement take?
faq.a2: Our Discovery phase takes 1-2 weeks. Implementation typically takes 3-6 weeks depending on complexity. Most clients see initial results within the first month and full ROI within 3-6 months.
faq.q3: What tools and platforms do you work with?
faq.a3: We're platform-agnostic and use the best tool for each job: n8n, Make (Integromat), Zapier, custom Python scripts, OpenAI, Claude, and various API integrations. We also work with existing CRMs, ERPs, and business tools your team already uses.
faq.q4: Do you work with businesses outside the US?
faq.a4: Absolutely! We work with businesses globally. Our team operates across multiple time zones, and we provide services in English, Portuguese, and Spanish. Remote collaboration is at our core.
faq.q5: What's included in the Free Process Assessment?
faq.a5: A 30-minute strategy call where we analyze your top 3 business processes, identify quick automation wins, and provide a preliminary ROI estimate. No commitment required — it's designed to show you what's possible.
faq.q6: What kind of ROI can I expect?
faq.a6: Our clients typically see 150-400% ROI within the first year. The average is 240%. ROI comes from time savings, error reduction, faster processing, and enabling your team to focus on high-value work instead of manual tasks.

aboutPage.title: The Bridge Between Vision and Execution
aboutPage.subtitle: We exist because too many businesses waste time and money on AI that doesn't work. The problem isn't the technology — it's the lack of process clarity.
aboutPage.storyP1: A7X Systems was born from a simple observation: businesses don't fail at AI because of bad tools. They fail because they automate chaos instead of clear processes.
aboutPage.storyP2: After years of watching companies invest in automation tools only to see them gather dust, we built a different approach. Process Clarity First. We map, analyze, and optimize your workflows before writing a single line of automation code.
aboutPage.storyP3: Today, we help businesses across 3 continents turn operational chaos into streamlined, AI-powered efficiency. Our Process Clarity framework has saved clients over $2.3M in combined operational costs.
aboutPage.missionDescription: To make AI accessible and effective for every business by ensuring process clarity comes before implementation.
aboutPage.visionDescription: A world where every business — regardless of size — has access to AI automation that delivers measurable, predictable ROI.
aboutPage.value1Description: We never implement before we understand. Process clarity is the foundation of everything we do.
aboutPage.value2Description: Every engagement must deliver quantifiable ROI. If we can't measure it, we don't do it.
aboutPage.value3Description: No black boxes. Our clients understand exactly what we build, why we build it, and how it works.
aboutPage.value4Description: AI moves fast. We stay ahead of the curve and continuously improve the solutions we deliver.
aboutPage.teamDescription: Our team combines deep process expertise with cutting-edge AI knowledge. We're not just technologists — we're business translators who speak both languages.
